metadata.title: CVE-2024-38998 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: jrburke requirejs v2.3.6 was discovered to contain a prototype pollutionvia the function config. This vulnerability allows attackers to executearbitrary code or cause a Denial of Service (DoS) via injecting arbitraryproperties.

criterions.comment: requirejs package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
